boardgame.name: Wooden Ships _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Iron Men
boardgame.description: Fighting ships in the age of sail! This classic title details military engagements in the golden age of sail with a plethora of historical scenarios. Players take their groups of ships and form their ship lines and then go at it. The game comes with a large generic ocean map overlaid with a hex grid. The ship counters occupy two hexes and include special rules for moving and firing with this design. Players can begin with the smaller scenarios and work up to whole fleets engaged in pitched battle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Avalon Hill Complexity Rating - 6_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Wooden Ships _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Iron Men is a well cared for vintage game copyrighted 1975 by Avalon Hill. Contents to my knowledge are complete, undamaged, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; complete. Chips are partially punched. Contents include instructions, game board in 2 sections, the Ship_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Log Pad (from which I think only 1/2 doz sheets used), Advanced Game Tables, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; a die. I have rated the game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;acceptable_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; because the box top has 1 split corner and shelf wear.

All components present and in very good to excellent condition. A few pages from the ship_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s log pad have been used. The box is also in a very good condition. Any questions please ask.

Box looks OK for it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s age but 2 corners split and some tape reinforced corners etc.

This is the complete game, opened and played, in good condition. It is the Avalon Hill edition of the game, published in 1975. About half the counters are punched, and all are in very good condition. The rulebook is in good condition, with clean interior pages, but with discoloration and dirt on the cover, and with wear and slight bending to the upper right corner of some pages. A few of the ship’s log pads have been used; the rest are clean. The tables page is slightly discolored. The mapboard is in very good condition with a few light dents from die rolls. It lies flat without difficulty. The box is in fair condition, with a slight bend to its sides, dirt from the price tag, and significant wear on all edges. The listed shipping price is for USPS Priority Mail -- You can likely save $2 or more if you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t mind using Parcel Post, instead. Also, note that I do reduce shipping charges if you buy more than one of my games -- Send me a message and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll calculate the discount. (I charge an estimate of the actual shipping cost.)
